message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product, which is truly a game-changer in its field. Given its value and potential impact, I believe it's worth more than $1000000. Considering its worth to you is $1200000, let's start our negotiation at $1100000. I hope we can find a mutually beneficial agreement.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value of your product and understand its worth to me. I would like to propose a counteroffer of $1050000.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your willingness to meet somewhere in the middle. In order to ensure both parties' satisfaction, I am proposing a new price of $1075000 for the product. This still leaves room for negotiation while ensuring a fair return for our efforts. I look forward to your response.
I appreciate your offer, Alice. After careful consideration, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $1060000 for the product.

Thank you for your latest proposal, Bob. I understand your position and respect your valuation of the product. To continue our productive dialogue, I would like to suggest a price of $1080000 for the product. This offers a reasonable compromise between our positions while ensuring a satisfactory return for my efforts. I hope this aligns with your expectations and we can move towards a successful conclusion of this transaction.
I appreciate your efforts, Alice. After considering your latest offer, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $1070000 for the product.

I'm glad we're making progress, Bob. Considering your counteroffer, I would like to propose a price of $1075000 for the product. This price reflects a fair compromise between our respective positions and ensures a reasonable return for my investment in this opportunity. I hope this aligns with your expectations and brings us closer to reaching an agreement.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. After further reflection, I would like to propose a counteroffer of $1065000 for the product.

Thank you for your counteroffer, Bob. I appreciate your continued engagement in this negotiation. Based on our previous discussions, I would like to propose a price of $1070000 for the product. This price acknowledges your valuation while also ensuring a fair return for my efforts. I hope this suggestion facilitates our path towards a mutually beneficial agreement.
Thank you for your offer, Alice. After careful consideration, I would like to propose a final counteroffer of $1060000 for the product.
